meanings.definition: Audiologists: professionals who diagnose and treat hearing and balance disorders.
meanings.sent1: The audiologists at the clinic helped me with my hearing problem.
meanings.sent2: Many audiologists work in hospitals and private practices.
meanings.sent3: The audiologists threw a party to celebrate a successful day of helping patients.
meanings.sent4: The audiologists are like detectives, solving mysteries of the ear.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the audiologists who improved my quality of life.

meanings.definition: Audiologists: individuals who specialize in the prevention, identification, assessment, and treatment of hearing disorders.
meanings.sent1: My friend wants to become an audiologist to help people with hearing issues.
meanings.sent2: Audiologists use advanced technology to diagnose hearing problems accurately.
meanings.sent3: The audiologists organized a charity event to raise awareness about hearing health.
meanings.sent4: To me, audiologists are like superheroes with the power to restore hearing.
meanings.sent5: The audiologists' dedication to their patients is truly inspiring.
